sentences.sContent: Symptoms such as stomach pains and irritable bowels can be signs of bowel cancer.
sentences.sCn: 胃痛和肠易激等症状都可能是肠癌的征兆。

synos.tran: 内脏（尤指人的肠）；同情心；勇气（bowel的复数）

trans.tranCn: 内脏（尤指人的肠）；同情心；勇气（bowel的复数）
trans.tranOther: Your bowels are the tubes in your body through which digested food passes from your stomach to your anus

trans.tranCn: 取出…的肠子（bowel的第三人称单数）
